prompt: Create a 404 Not Found page with a white background and a subtle gray border (BorderSide(color: Colors.grey[300])). Display '404' in bold orange (Colors.orange[800], font size 70). Show 'Page Not Found' in orange (Colors.orange[600], font size 24, semi-bold). Include a message 'This page is unavailable or has been moved.' in gray (Colors.grey[600], font size 16). Add an orange 'Go Home' button with rounded corners (borderRadius: 10) and white text. Use a Column layout with mainAxisAlignment.center and crossAxisAlignment.center. Wrap the Column in a Container with a white background and a gray border (border: Border.all(color: Colors.grey[300])). Apply padding of 24.0 inside the Container. Use a Scaffold with a transparent background.
